remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何建構字型的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 建構字型系列和字型](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-construct-font-families-and-fonts.md)。For more information about how to construct fonts, see [How to: Construct Font Families and Fonts](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-construct-font-families-and-fonts.md). Windows Forms 應用程式支援 TrueType 字型，並具有有限的 OpenType 字型支援。Windows Forms applications support TrueType fonts and have limited support for OpenType fonts. 如果您嘗試使用不支援的字型，或正在執行的應用程式的電腦上未安裝字型，將會取代 Microsoft Sans Serif 字型。If you attempt to use a font that is not supported, or the font is not installed on the machine that is running the application, the Microsoft Sans Serif font will be substituted. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式與， ，和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor and the , , and properties. 這個範例設計來搭配 Windows 表單，其中包含名為`ComboBox1`，並填入字串"越大 」 和 「 小 」 並名為`Label1`。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form that contains a named `ComboBox1` that is populated with the strings "Bigger" and "Smaller" and a named `Label1`. 將下列程式碼貼到表單，並將產生關聯`ComboBox1_SelectedIndexChanged`方法事件的控制項。Paste the following code into the form and associate the `ComboBox1_SelectedIndexChanged` method with the event of the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當地語系化的應用程式為基礎[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]和舊版本中，指定字型`prototype`當該字型尚未安裝用來建置您的應用程式的電腦上，會導致要使用的 Microsoft Sans Serif 字型改為。For localized applications that are based on the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] and earlier releases, specifying a font for `prototype` when that font has not been installed on the computer that is used to build your application will cause the Microsoft Sans Serif font to be used instead. 如果應用程式相依於此行為，而且您必須重新編譯您的應用程式的.NET Framework 3.0，您應該指定的 Microsoft Sans Serif 字型`prototype`。If your application depends on this behavior and you must recompile your application for the .NET Framework 3.0, you should specify the Microsoft Sans Serif font for `prototype`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範運算子建構函式，而屬性。The following code example demonstrates the operator, the constructor, and the property. 這個範例設計來搭配 Windows 表單，其中包含一個按鈕名為`Button2`。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form that contains a button named `Button2`. 將下列程式碼貼到您的表單，並將產生關聯`Button2_Click`方法，按鈕之事件。Paste the following code into your form and associate the `Button2_Click` method with the button's event. summary.span: 傳回這個字型的行距 (單位為像素)。

returns.span: 這個字型的行距 (單位為像素)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行距是兩個連續文字行基準線之間的垂直距離。The line spacing of a is the vertical distance between the base lines of two consecutive lines of text. 因此，行距包含本身的字元高度以及行之間的空白空間。Thus, the line spacing includes the blank space between lines along with the height of the character itself. 如果以外之字型的屬性設定為任何項目，使用的垂直解析度的螢幕顯示計算的高度 （以像素為單位）。If the property of the font is set to anything other than , the height (in pixels) is calculated using the vertical resolution of the screen display. 例如，假設字型單位是英吋，字型大小為 0.3。For example, suppose the font unit is inches and the font size is 0.3. 也假設相對應的字型系列，其 em 高度為 2048年，行距是 2355年。Also suppose that for the corresponding font family, the em-height is 2048 and the line spacing is 2355. 垂直解析度為 96 dpi 螢幕顯示，您可以計算高度，如下所示：For a screen display that has a vertical resolution of 96 dots per inch, you can calculate the height as follows: 2355\*(0.3/2048)\*96 = 33.117192355\*(0.3/2048)\*96 = 33.11719

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行距是兩個連續文字行基準線之間的垂直距離。The line spacing of a is the vertical distance between the base lines of two consecutive lines of text. 因此，行距包含本身的字元高度以及行之間的空白空間。Thus, the line spacing includes the blank space between lines along with the height of the character itself. 如果以外之字型的屬性設定為任何項目，使用指定的垂直解析度計算的高度，單位為像素物件。If the property of the font is set to anything other than , the height, in pixels, is calculated using the vertical resolution of the specified object. 例如，假設字型單位是英吋，字型大小為 0.3。For example, suppose the font unit is inches and the font size is 0.3. 也假設相對應的字型系列，其 em 高度為 2048年，行距是 2355年。Also suppose that for the corresponding font family, the em-height is 2048 and the line spacing is 2355. 如果物件具有屬性值和96 dpi 為單位的高度屬性值的計算方式如下：If the object has a property value of and a property value of 96 dots per inch, the height is calculated as follows: 2355\*(0.3/2048)\*96 = 33.11718752355\*(0.3/2048)\*96 = 33.1171875 繼續使用相同的範例，假設的屬性物件設定為而非。Continuing with the same example, suppose the property of the object is set to rather than . 然後 （使用 1 英吋 = 25.4 公釐為單位） 的高度，以公釐為單位，計算方式如下：Then (using 1 inch = 25.4 millimeters) the height, in millimeters, is calculated as follows: 2355\*(0.3/2048)25.4 = 8.7622562355\*(0.3/2048)25.4 = 8.762256 ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立 。Creates a . - 將一行文字繪製至畫面中，使用新。Draws a line of text to the screen, using the new . - 取得字型的高度。Gets the height of the font. - 繪製正下方的第一行文字的第二的行。Draws a second line of text directly below the first line.
